sentences.en: He was ordered to snipe at anyone moving about the camp.
sentences.cn: 他奉令狙击任何在营地附近走动的人.

sentences.en: I propose that every time an American bags a snipe, the federal government should pay him or her $100.
sentences.cn: 美国需要更多的猎鹬者，我提议一个美国人每捕到一只鹬，联邦政府支付给他100美元。

sentences.en: I started some half - dozen snipe.
In the south a snipe hunt is practically a rite of passage.
sentences.cn: 在南方,猎取鹬类实际上是一种成人仪式.

sentences.en: Jack is seldom irritated when newspapermen snipe at him in their columns.
sentences.cn: 杰克很少因为新闻记者撰稿在报纸上攻击他而生气.

sentences.en: Old World snipe larger and darker than the whole snipe.
sentences.cn: 东半球沙锥鸟,体大、色深.

sentences.en: Snipe a Psi Round , which currently does 20 damage + 80 versus Psionic Units.
sentences.cn: 用幽能子弹发动狙击能立刻对灵能单位目标造成20+80的伤害.

sentences.en: So snipe would do 35 damage to light units that are not casters.
sentences.cn: 这样狙击就能对轻甲单,还不是施法者,位造成35点伤害了.

sentences.en: The media were still sniping at the president's adviser yesterday.
sentences.cn: 昨天媒体依旧在抨击总统的顾问。

sentences.en: The snipe has a very long thin beak.
sentences.cn: 鹬长着非常细长的鸟嘴.

sentences.en: There was not much elbow room in the cockpit of a Snipe.
sentences.cn: “沙锥鸟”战斗机的驾驶舱空间不太宽敞。

sentences.en: When the snipe and the clam grapple , it is the fisherman who profits.
William, determined to make this last day a day of thorough enjoyment , was out snipe shooting.
sentences.cn: 这是威廉在这里的最后一天,他要好好玩一玩, 因此出外打鹬去了.

sentences.en: Would not the first of them who saw me wring my neck like a snipe's?
sentences.cn: 他们中谁若是看到我,难道不会把我像只鹭鸶似的拧断脖子?

words.tran_cn: [军]狙击；[鸟]鹬；香烟屁股；被开玩笑的人物
狙击；[军]伏击；抨击；猎鸟；诽谤

trans.tran_cn: 狙击，[鸟]鹬，沙锥鸟，<美俚>烟屁股，香烟头，可鄙的人

trans.tran_en: to shoot from a hidden position at people who are not protected

trans.tran_cn: 伏击，狙击，猎鸟，诽谤，中伤
狙击，打沙锥鸟，中伤，暗害
